solution.text:
Amylose $\Rightarrow \mathrm{It}$ is a plant based starch it has $\alpha-\mathrm{C}_1-\mathrm{C}_4$ glycosidic linkage.

Cellulose $\Rightarrow$ It has $\beta-\mathrm{C}_1-\mathrm{C}_4$ glycosidic linkage
Glycogen $\Rightarrow$ It has $\alpha-\mathrm{C}_1-\mathrm{C}_4$ and glycosidic linkage (animal starch)
Amylopectin $\Rightarrow$ It is a plant based with $\alpha-\mathrm{C}_1-\mathrm{C}_4$ and $\mathrm{C}_1-\mathrm{C}_6$ glycosidic linkage
